BBK01.SUD221: New business (volumes) of German banks / Loans for other purposes to households with an initial rate fixation of over 1 year and up to 5 years

General: Estimated. The volume of new business is extrapolated to form the underlying total using the Horvitz-Thompson estimator. For the purpose of these statistics, other loans are loans granted for other purposes such as business, debt consolidation, education etc. p = Provisional
